attributes.action: Outlaw the use of Silent Phone Calls to private numbers from computerised call centres
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned want a law passed in parliament to outlaw "unknown number" calls, which when you pick up the phone, there is silence.  This is very worrying, and when it happens at 1:40 am and you have elderly relatives, or relatives who are on holiday abroad can be very concerning and worrying.
